title: Junior Developer Intern
description:
Responsibilities:

Collaborate with the development team to design, develop, and test software applications with a strong focus on product functionality and user experience.
Assist in troubleshooting and resolving software defects or issues, ensuring the stability and reliability of the applications.
Participate in code reviews to maintain code quality, optimize performance, and adhere to coding standards.
Contribute to the creation and maintenance of technical documentation to ensure clarity and ease of use for future reference.
Stay updated with the latest technologies, tools, and frameworks relevant to our product stack, and propose innovative solutions to enhance software development processes.
Assist in identifying areas of improvement within the software applications and actively contribute to their implementation.
Collaborate with cross-functional teams to gather requirements, understand product needs, and translate them into technical specifications.
Support the integration of third-party APIs and external services to extend the functionality of our software applications.
Develop and execute software test plans and test cases to ensure the quality and reliability of the applications.
Work closely with team members to meet project deadlines, deliver high-quality software solutions, and contribute to the success of our products.

Requirements:

Completed degree in Computer Science, Software Engineering, or a related field.
Passionate about software development and programming, with a demonstrated interest in building innovative solutions.
Strong understanding of software development methodologies, data structures, algorithms, and object-oriented programming principles.
Solid problem-solving and analytical skills, with the ability to translate requirements into practical technical solutions.
Attention to detail and commitment to writing clean, maintainable code to ensure software quality and longevity.
Excellent communication and teamwork skills, with the ability to collaborate effectively with team members and stakeholders.
Enthusiasm for learning and keeping up with emerging technologies and programming languages.
Ability to work independently, manage time effectively, and prioritize tasks to meet project deadlines.

Attractive Perks and Incentives:

In addition to gaining valuable experience and enhancing your programming skills, we offer a range of perks and incentives to make your internship as a Junior Developer even more rewarding. Here are some of the benefits you can expect:

Competitive Compensation: We offer a competitive internship package that recognizes your skills, contributions, and commitment to the role.

Learning and Development Opportunities: As a Junior Developer intern, you will have access to various learning resources, including workshops, training programs, and online courses. These opportunities will help you sharpen your technical skills, learn new programming languages, and stay updated with industry trends.

Mentorship and Guidance: We believe in the power of mentorship. Throughout your internship, you will have the opportunity to work closely with experienced developers who will provide guidance, share their knowledge, and help you grow both technically and professionally.

Real-World Project Experience: You will work on real-world projects, allowing you to apply your programming skills to practical scenarios. This hands-on experience will boost your confidence and help you build a strong portfolio.

Collaborative Team Environment: We foster a collaborative and inclusive work environment where you can collaborate with talented professionals from various disciplines. You will have the opportunity to learn from your colleagues and contribute to a supportive team dynamic.

Professional Networking: We encourage networking opportunities by organizing events and activities where you can connect with industry professionals, build relationships, and expand your professional network.

Flexible Work Environment: We understand the importance of work-life balance and offer flexibility in terms of work hours and remote work arrangements whenever possible.

Recognition and Rewards: We value and appreciate hard work and outstanding performance. You will have the chance to be recognized and rewarded for your achievements through various programs and initiatives.

Career Development Path: As a Junior Developer intern, you will have the opportunity to explore career paths within our organization. Exceptional performance may open doors to future employment or extended project engagements.

Fun and Social Activities: We believe in fostering a positive work culture. We organize social events, team-building activities, and celebrations to ensure you have an enjoyable and fulfilling internship experience.

Join our team as a Junior Developer intern and take advantage of these exciting perks and incentives that will contribute to your long-term success and growth in the field of software development.

Stipend: Rs 2000/- + Performance-based incentives and Potential Hiring Opportunity.

Duration: Full time, 3 months

Job Types: Fresher, Internship
Contract length: 3 months

Pay: ₹2,000.00 per month

Benefits:

Flexible schedule
Paid sick time
Work from home

Work Location: Remote

title: Software Engineer Intern
description:
You should apply if you:
Love figuring things out, learning fast, and taking ownership
Want to build features from 0 1 or scale them 1 10
Are curious about startups, or want to build your own someday
Have built and deployed at least one full-stack project (from scratch or in a team)
Are ultra-ambitious and have a high-growth, high-impact ownership mentality.
What You'll Work On:
Build engaging learning tools with adaptive and personalized learning paths.
Improve our automated interview training system that uses multimodal analysis (video, audio, speech).
Add gamification features to drive retention and engagement across our programs.
Ship high-quality features end-to-end, from UI to backend APIs.
Collaborate directly with our founder and senior engineers on product and tech decisions.
Qualifications:
Good with front-end UI/UX Design
Experience in building+deploying websites end-to-end
Writing production-grade backend APIs
Core Technological Skills Required:
React, NextJs, Tailwind/ShadCN
ExpressJS
Azure Cloud Services
ML/Dev Ops (Github Actions + CI/CD + Monitoring)
Time-Period & Commitment:
3 months
40-45 hours/week (Apply only if you can give full-time commitment)
Expected Stipend:
~18k/month
About Us:
We are a bootstrapped ed-tech company helping working professionals upskill in AI/ML.
We do so via our upskilling programs, software tools, and structured mentorship.
We have a competent team, with people from CMU, IIIT-H, NIT-K, DAVV, etc.
You'll be working closely with our founder, Abbhinav Venkat, who is an ex-Stanford AI researcher, and has been a part of multiple Silicon Valley startups.

title: Software Developer Intern
description:
Job Information

Date Opened

01/30/2026

Job Type

Training

Industry

IT Services

Salary

5 - 12K/Month

Remote Job

Job Description

This is a remote position.

We are looking for a passionate Software Developer Intern with hands-on experience in Next.js, React, and TailwindCSS. You will work closely with our engineering team to build high-quality, scalable web applications. If you are someone who learns fast, enjoys problem-solving, and uses AI tools to speed up development, this role is perfect for you. The duration of this internship will be 6 Months.


Develop responsive and user-friendly UI using React, Next.js, and TailwindCSS

Assist in building new features and improving existing components

Collaborate with designers, PMs, and senior engineers

Write clean, maintainable, and reusable code

Use AI tools (e.g., GitHub Copilot, ChatGPT) to optimize development workflow

Participate in code reviews and follow best engineering practices

Debug issues and contribute to performance improvements




Requirements
Good understanding of JavaScript, React, and Next.js

Experience building UI with TailwindCSS

Strong problem-solving and analytical thinking

Familiarity with Git/GitHub

Ability to learn quickly and adapt to new tools and technologies

Experience using AI-powered coding tools is a plus



Benefits
Hands-on experience working on live projects

Guidance and mentorship from experienced developers

Opportunity to learn modern development workflows and AI-assisted programming

Exposure to full-stack product development cycles

Certificate of Internship & potential full-time offer based on performance

title: Intern - Software
description:
Job Description: Full Stack Developer Intern
Position: Software Intern Communication
Location: Bangalore
Duration: 6 months

About the Role:
-
We are seeking a motivated and curious Full Stack Developer Intern with a strong
foundation in both web technologies and computer networking. This is an exciting
opportunity to work on real-world IoT/Edge/Network-integrated systems and contribute
to backend, frontend, and networking layer integrations.
Responsibilities:
-
Build and maintain full stack applications (React/Flask/NodeJS etc.)
Integrate backend logic with networking protocols (e.g., socket programming, REST
APIs,OS )
Develop dashboards for real-time data visualization from network devices
Interface with systems like routers, Raspberry Pi
Write scripts and tools to monitor or control network-connected devices
Assist in deploying apps using Docker, SSH, or cloud platforms (AWS/GCP)
Tech Stack:
-
Frontend: React.js / HTML / CSS / JavaScript
Backend: Flask / Node.js / Python / Java /C++
Networking: Basic TCP/IP, WebSockets, SSH, VPN, REST
Database: MongoDB / PostgreSQL / SQLite

Requirements:
-
Currently pursuing or recently completed B.Tech/B.E/MCA in CS/IT/ECE or related field
Knowledge of basic networking concepts
Experience with any backend and frontend framework
Familiarity with Linux and terminal-based debugging
Eagerness to learn and solve practical networking + software problems
Good to Have:
Exposure to Raspberry Pi or IoT projects

Interview Process
-
Stage 1: Resume Screening & Quick Call
Check basic qualifications, enthusiasm, project experience
Ask about any networking/IoT or full stack mini-projects
Stage 2: Technical Round 1
Mini project or assignment (e.g., “Build a simple Flask app to show data from a network
device in a dashboard”, or “Simulate two systems sending JSON data and aggregate it”)
Stage 3: Technical Round 2
10 min: Networking basics
10 min: Full stack logic
10 min: Data Structure problem
10 min: Discussion on learning goals & future interest

title: Intern – Software Developer
description:
About Fospe

Fospe is a digital transformation and technology-driven company focused on building scalable software solutions. We work with modern technologies and global clients, providing young talent the opportunity to grow in a real-world development environment.

Role Overview

We are looking for passionate and motivated Software Developer Interns with a strong interest in Node.js development. This internship is ideal for fresh graduates who want hands-on experience working on live projects under the guidance of experienced developers.

Responsibilities
Assist in developing and maintaining backend applications using Node.js
Work with APIs, databases, and server-side logic
Collaborate with senior developers and cross-functional teams
Debug, test, and optimize application performance
Learn and follow best coding practices and documentation standards
Required Skills
Basic knowledge of JavaScript and Node.js
Understanding of REST APIs
Familiarity with databases (MongoDB/MySQL is a plus)
Basic knowledge of Git or version control
Strong problem-solving and learning mindset
Eligibility Criteria
Freshers who graduated in 2023 or 2024 only
Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, IT, or related field
Willingness to work in a hybrid model
Good communication and teamwork skills
What We Offer
Hands-on experience with real-world projects
Mentorship from experienced developers
Hybrid working flexibility
Internship certificate upon successful completion
Opportunity for full-time employment based on performance

Apply via LinkedIn only:

title: Software Engineer Intern
description:
Location: On-site (Bangalore)
Duration: 3 Months
Stipend: Unpaid
No. Of Opening: 10
Full-Time Opportunity: Yes — Outstanding performers will receive a full-time offer

About the Internship

We are hiring Software Engineer Interns who are passionate about coding and want hands-on experience working on real client projects.This internship will help you build strong technical skills in Node.js, React, JavaScript, Flutter, and React Native.

Responsibilities

Assist in developing software applications using Node.js, React, JavaScript, Flutter, or React Native (based on your skill area).
Write clean, efficient, and maintainable code.
Support API development, UI/UX implementation, and feature integration.
Participate in debugging, testing, and deployment activities.
Collaborate with senior developers to build scalable solutions.
Research new tools, frameworks, and development best practices.
Document code and project-related information.

Required Skills (Any One or More of the Following)Core Programming Skills

Strong understanding of DSAfundamentals.
Good problem-solving and logical thinking ability.

Backend Development

Basic knowledge of Node.js.
Understanding of REST APIs and databases (MongoDB/MySQL).
Familiarity with Git.

Frontend Development

Basic knowledge of React (hooks, components, state management).
Understanding of HTML, CSS, JavaScript.

Mobile App Development

Basic experience in Flutter (Dart) or React Native (JavaScript).
Understanding of mobile UI/UX guidelines.

Eligibility

BCA / MCA / B.Tech / B.E. / M.Tech students or any graduate.
Candidates who want real industry experience and project exposure.

What You Will Learn

Working on real-world client projects.
Agile development process, Git workflow, API development, and deployment.
Industry standards for coding, testing, and documentation.
Mentorship from senior developers.
How to build production-ready applications.

Perks & Benefits

Certificate of Internship.
Letter of Recommendation (Performance-based).
Opportunity to convert into a full-time Software Developer role.
Direct experience that strengthens your portfolio and resume.

Job Type: Internship
Contract length: 3 months

Work Location: In person

title: Full Stack Developer Intern
description:
Role: Full Stack Developer Intern
Location: Remote (India)
Duration: 3–6 Months
Stipend: As per the industry standards
Conversion: PPO for high performers

About Nodded

Nodded is a stealth-mode startup building a modern discovery and digital identity platform for the service economy. We are designing how businesses, creators, and professionals present themselves, establish trust, and get discovered without fragmented tools.

What You’ll Work On

Design and develop backend services and REST APIs
Build and maintain authentication, user profiles, and core data flows
Integrate AI-powered features such as search, recommendations, enrichment, or automation
Work with databases for data modeling, querying, and optimization
Collaborate with frontend to deliver end-to-end product features
Contribute to frontend components where needed to complete full-stack flows

Tech Stack (Indicative)

Typescript , Node.js / Express (or similar backend frameworks)
PostgreSQL / Firebase / Supabase
Python (for AI/ML services, scripts, or integrations)
React / Next.js
REST APIs
Git & modern deployment workflows

What We’re Looking For

Strong fundamentals in backend development and programming concepts
Hands-on experience with Node.js and/or Python
Understanding of databases, SQL, and backend architecture
Familiarity with Large Language Models (LLMs) and their practical use in applications
Experience using Python for AI/ML workflows (experimentation, data handling, integrations)
Basic frontend knowledge with React or similar frameworks
Ability to think in terms of systems, data flow, and scalability

Good to Have (Not Mandatory)

Experience with full-stack projects or side products
Knowledge of vector databases, embeddings, or AI pipelines
Exposure to cloud platforms and deployment
Understanding of authentication, authorization, and security best practices

Why This Internship Matters

Work on real, production-grade full-stack features
Gain hands-on experience building AI-enabled systems
High ownership and direct founder mentorship
Portfolio-worthy work on a live platform
Clear path to full-time opportunity based on performance

Job Type: Internship
Contract length: 6 months

Pay: ₹5,000.00 - ₹10,000.00 per month

Benefits:

Work from home

Work Location: Remote

title: Full Stack Developer Intern
description:
We're

#Hiring – Full Stack Developer Intern! Immediate joiners preferred.

Novixpert Tech Inc. is a leader in innovative technology solutions, pushing the boundaries of what’s possible with vision intelligence. Our team is dedicated to creating cutting-edge products that leverage the latest advancements in software engineering, machine learning, and edge computing. We are seeking a passionate and talented Full Stack Developer Intern to join our team and contribute to the development of advanced web-based and edge-integrated software applications.

Job Overview: As a Full Stack Developer Intern, you will work on developing end-to-end software applications that support high-performance vision-intelligence systems. You will help design, build, and optimize both the front-end and back-end components, ensuring seamless integration with machine learning pipelines and edge-based devices. This internship offers a unique opportunity to gain hands-on experience with modern web technologies, APIs, and scalable application architectures in a dynamic and supportive environment.

Key Responsibilities:
Collaborate with software and machine learning engineers to understand project requirements and objectives.
Develop and maintain front-end components using modern web technologies.
Assist in writing clean, scalable code and participating in code reviews.
Troubleshoot and resolve issues related to API calls, UI functionality, and backend performance.
Document development processes, API specifications, and system updates.

Qualifications:
Recently graduated with a degree in Computer Science, Software Engineering, IT, or a related field.
Basic understanding of full stack development concepts.
Knowledge of RESTful APIs and basic software architecture principles.
Strong problem-solving skills and attention to detail.
Excellent communication and teamwork abilities.
Eagerness to learn and adapt to new technologies and frameworks.

What We Offer:
- Hands-on experience with full stack development in real-world applications.
- Mentorship from experienced engineers and developers.
- Opportunity to contribute to innovative vision-intelligence projects.
- Flexible working hours and a collaborative, growth-oriented environment.

Interested candidates are requested to share their updated resume at arshlan@novixpert.com

Job Type: Internship
Contract length: 3-4 months

Pay: ₹300,000.00 - ₹350,000.00 per year

Work Location: In person

title: Full-Stack Developer Intern (Python & React)
description:
Job Title: Full-Stack Developer Intern(Python & React)
Company: Fusionpact Technology
Location: Remote
Experience: 1–4 Years (Open to strong freshers with excellent project experience)
Employment Type: Full-time
Duration: 12 months with a PPO conversion opportunity before the mark of 12 months.

About Fusionpact Technology
Fusionpact Technology is a fast-growing IT consulting and product development company delivering next-generation digital solutions to global clients. We specialize in AI/ML, Cloud Computing, Automation, Blockchain, and modern software development, enabling businesses to drive digital transformation at scale.
We foster a learning-driven, innovation-focused culture where engineers work on real-world scalable products, collaborate with mentors, and grow rapidly in their careers.

Role Overview
We are looking for a Full-Stack Developer Intern(Python & React) who can work across backend and frontend to build secure, scalable, and user-friendly web applications.
You will be involved in the complete development lifecycle — from API design and database development to UI implementation and deployment.

Key Responsibilities
Design, develop, and maintain backend services and RESTful APIs using Python frameworks (FastAPI)
Build responsive, reusable, and high-performance frontend components using React.js
Integrate frontend applications with backend APIs to ensure seamless data flow
Work with databases (PostgreSQL / MySQL / MongoDB) to design schemas and optimize queries
Implement authentication, authorization, and role-based access control (RBAC)
Ensure application performance, scalability, and security best practices
Debug, test, troubleshoot, and optimize existing features across the stack
Collaborate with product, design, and QA teams for smooth delivery
Participate in code reviews, sprint planning, and Agile development processes
Follow clean coding standards, documentation, and best software engineering practices

Required Skills
Strong understanding of Python programming
Hands-on experience with React.js
Experience building and consuming REST APIs
Solid knowledge of HTML, CSS, JavaScript (ES6+)
Familiarity with relational and NoSQL databases
Experience with Git and version control systems
Understanding of basic software architecture and system design
Strong problem-solving skills and ability to work independently

Good-to-Have Skills
Experience with FastAPI or Django REST Framework
State management tools (Redux / Context API)
Exposure to Docker & Docker Compose
Basic cloud experience (AWS / GCP / Azure)
Unit & integration testing practices
CI/CD fundamentals and DevOps awareness

What We Offer
Opportunity to work on real-world scalable products
Learning-focused environment with mentorship from senior engineers
Full time conversion opportunity before 12 months mark
Flexible work culture (Remote/Hybrid options)
Exposure to cutting-edge technologies across industries
Inclusive culture where collaboration matters more than hierarchy
